# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("/home/bobwilmes/boomer/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_BOOMER_CPP_FILES
    "/home/bobwilmes/boomer/source/boomer.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_BOOMER_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/home/bobwilmes/boomer/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")
set(YOTTA_AUTO_BOOMER_HEADER_FILES
    "/home/bobwilmes/boomer/source/lsm303agr.h"
    "/home/bobwilmes/boomer/source/fsm.h"
)
# force dependency on the config header for header files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_BOOMER_HEADER_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/home/bobwilmes/boomer/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_executable (boomer
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_BOOMER_CPP_FILES}
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_BOOMER_HEADER_FILES}
)
set_target_properties(boomer PROPERTIES ENABLE_EXPORTS ON)

yotta_postprocess_target(EXECUTABLE boomer)



target_link_libraries(boomer
    microbit
)
